tossupQ:
EARTH SCIENCE Multiple Choice The Sun’s tide-generating force is about: 
 
W) one-half that of the Moon 
X) twice that of the Moon 
Y) one-fourth that of the Moon 
Z) 4-times that of the Moon
tossupA: W) ONE-HALF THAT OF THE MOON

GENERAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following would contain the most dietary 
vitamin D: 
 
W) 1 egg yolk 
X) 1 table spoon cod liver oil 
Y) 1 ounce Swiss cheese 
Z) 1 cup vitamin D-fortified whole milk
bonusA:
X) 1 TABLE SPOON COD LIVER OIL 
 
(Solution: egg ~ 40 IU; cod liver oil ~ 1360; cheese ~ 12; milk ~ 40)

PHYSICAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following best explains the benefit of 
adding a solution of ethylene glycol, or antifreeze, to the radiator of a car:

X) raises the freezing point and raises the boiling point

bonusQ:
PHYSICAL SCIENCE Multiple Choice Which of the following has the GREATEST kinetic 
energy for an object moving in a straight path: 
 
W) a mass of 2 kg with a velocity of 10 meters per second 
X) a mass of 4 kg with a velocity of 8 meters per second 
Y) a mass of 6 kg with a velocity of 6 meters per second 
Z) a mass of 8 kg with a velocity of 4 meters per second
bonusA:
X) A MASS OF 4 KG WITH A VELOCITY OF 8 METERS PER SECOND 
 
(Solution: KE = ½ mass × velocity<sup>2</sup>)

REACTION
